casebody.data:
APPEALS ALLOWED

01-2107. State v. Riemer.

Cuyahoga App. No. 78952. Discretionary appeal allowed on Proposition of Law No. II.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., concur. Resnick, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur but would also allow all other propositions of law. Douglas and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent.
